author: Jonamaster
title: Awesome minifigs!
review:
This is a really good set.. I really wanted all the humans, cuz, I already had Sensei Keiken, and Ryo(3) so this was a great oppertunity to get all the humans!

Pros:
Ha-Ya-To!
Hikaru!
Takeshi!
You can take off all the parts except the little part of the pants!

Cons:
Magnets.

over all, This is a REALLY great set! (even though I havent got it in the mail yet) :)

author: chriswilson3333
title: Get this if you like exo-force
review: This is a great set to get because the minifigs can be used as firdge magnets or as pilots for home made battle machines if you dont have enough money to buy the real things or even to gaurd a base. The reason I gave this set a 5 is because of the many uses of the minifigs.

author: alexfig8
title: Easy way to get Exo-Force minifigures
review:
This is a pretty easy way to get the main Exo-Force characters without having to buy all of the sets.  Unlike Star Wars minifigures, they don't have any sort of base, the magnets are directly in the minifigures' legs.  This does mean that the torso and legs do NOT come apart, however, this isn't a huge deal since the figures are still fully poseable as a normal figure would be.  The heads and hair seem to be normal, the hair fits a little bit looser but not anything terrible, and the heads are still double-sided as the figures normally are.  

Overall, it's worth it to get the main figures at a fairly cheap price.
